comments.author: System
comments.comment:
Chat started: 2018-02-02 04:19 AM UTC

(04:19:21 AM) boost me: I am just 70 RP short for my favorite skin on my favorite champion: Beekeeper Singed. I don't know if you guys still do this but I wanted to submit a piece of art I've worked on. I've just spent like 2 hours on this. It may not be much, but it may be worth 70 RP. (I didn't know what department to choose for this).

Thank you for your time and good luck on the rift.
(04:19:33 AM) *** SelfAwareNPC joined the chat ***
(04:19:36 AM) SelfAwareNPC: hello there
(04:19:40 AM) boost me: Greetings!
(04:19:47 AM) SelfAwareNPC: Ooh, I'd love to see your art!
(04:20:07 AM) boost me: Visitor uploaded: mysinged.png
URL: https://v2uploads.zopim.io/3/j/U/3jUIGKXKmjfhwU4bNVnsKWZ116CnbWUf/1077d8b3009a248b63771cac2b34cd2d78224c6e.png

URL: https://v2uploads.zopim.io/3/j/U/3jUIGKXKmjfhwU4bNVnsKWZ116CnbWUf/f42bdc641497755007f9f72ec1004ad010e482fd.png

(04:20:12 AM) SelfAwareNPC: oh boy oh boy
(04:20:40 AM) boost me: Do you love singed?
(04:20:42 AM) boost me: I love singed.
(04:20:51 AM) SelfAwareNPC: oh honey
(04:20:57 AM) SelfAwareNPC: this looks so rad
(04:20:59 AM) SelfAwareNPC: nice work!
(04:21:09 AM) boost me: you're making me blush.
(04:21:13 AM) boost me: thank you though.
(04:21:15 AM) SelfAwareNPC: I would love Singed if I wasn't so bad at playing him.
(04:21:29 AM) boost me: who do you play instead
(04:21:34 AM) SelfAwareNPC: Braum
(04:21:57 AM) boost me: He's good right now!
(04:21:57 AM) SelfAwareNPC: I get killed by Singed a lot though, so I can appreciate the champ lol
(04:22:05 AM) boost me: The hear is the strongest muscle.
(04:22:06 AM) boost me: heart*
(04:22:17 AM) SelfAwareNPC: Ooh, poetic. The beekeeper skin is my fav too.
(04:22:35 AM) SelfAwareNPC: I'm loading up your account to get the RP for you--this part will take just a moment
(04:22:52 AM) boost me: I feel blessed.
(04:23:25 AM) SelfAwareNPC: Well, let's keep that feeling going. Here, watch some puppies while I hook up your account:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BH5FnM_dVvE
(04:23:55 AM) boost me: I feel like working at Riot is the equivalent of watching that stream.
(04:24:45 AM) SelfAwareNPC: I like it, but sometimes we do have to clean up after the puppy's potty training accidents if you know what I mean.
(04:24:54 AM) SelfAwareNPC: Either way, the rp is now on the account :D
(04:24:59 AM) boost me: yikes
(04:25:05 AM) SelfAwareNPC: you may have to restart it for the points total to update though.
(04:25:06 AM) boost me: Thank you very much good sir/lady.
